content: **this listing is for the pdf pattern only not the finished product it s a crochet pattern to help you make your blossom cup cozy no physical item will be mailed to you ** introducing the blossom cup crochet pattern this simple design offers a quick and easy way to add handmade charm and warmth to your daily coffee or tea routine make thoughtful gifts or enhance your shop inventory designed with simplicity in mind it s ideal for crocheters of any skill level the pattern is made with a #4 worsted weight yarn and is sized for a large cup but no worries i ve included detailed instructions to adjust the pattern to other cup sizes pattern attributes the pattern is simple detailed and thoroughly tested written in us terms skill level easy yarn type #4 worsted weight yarn crochet hooks h 5mm and 4 5mm the pattern includes a step by step detailed written instructions happy crocheting
